name: Can You Escape Ghost Zombie Rooms In Galaxy? - Season 2
name_original: Can You Escape Ghost Zombie Rooms In Galaxy? - Season 2
description:
This is ***Season 2*** !!!!!!!!!!!!

You are locked in a dark, damp room, in the middle of an abandoned space station filled with zombie-mutants. With no place to wait for, no one will come to get you out of here. You need to get to the spaceship to escape from this place. But how to do it? The door is locked, it seems there is no way to open it, or is there? On the way you encounter many traps and puzzles, you have to deal with the enemies that will be in your way. It will be a difficult but exciting adventure for you!

Features
Unique brain teasers
Challenging logic puzzles
Easy to start – impossible to put down
Auto-save function
Amazing graphics
Outside of the box thinking
Balanced difficulty

How to play
Find and combine items
Solve mini-puzzles
just escape!

Good luck and have fun!
